item.title: Base: Introducing Creator Content Transaction Fee Splitting Mechanism in the Base app
item.description: August 8th, Base tweeted that on the Base app, creators have the opportunity to earn income when users engage with their content. Each time a post is bought or sold, the creator will directly receive a fee into their wallet. Commencing from today, Base will start to support creators in this new global economic model by collecting minted content.In addition, Base declared that this series is not intended for investment returns and is not financial advice; it is advisable that you conduct your own research. Base plans to hold these tokens indefinitely and will neither trade nor sell them. We think that creators should be directly rewarded for their creativity and hope to show how creators can make a profit from their content.

item.title: Vitalik: Ethereum Treasury Foundation Expands ETH Investment Channels, But Mishandling Could Lead to "Over-Leveraged Gamble"
item.description: On August 8th, as per Cointelegraph, Vitalik, the founder of Ethereum, stated that the Ethereum Treasury company has broadened the channels for a more extensive set of investors to gain access to ETH. However, he cautioned that if not managed properly, this trend might develop into an "over-leveraged game."

item.title: Base Token Ecotoken Experiences Widespread Price Increase, ZORA Surges 30% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 8th, based on GMGN market data, the Base ecosystem tokens generally witnessed a price increase. These include:· ZORA witnessed a 30.1% price rise in the past 24 hours. It currently has a market capitalization of $256 million and a 24-hour trading volume of $176 million.· BNKR saw a 17.2% price increase in the last 24 hours. Its current market capitalization is $81.59 million and the 24-hour trading volume is $12.45 million.· DRB had a 30.5% price increase in the past 24 hours. It currently has a market capitalization of $19.19 million and a 24-hour trading volume of $3.92 million.· KTA saw a 28.7% price increase in the last 24 hours. It currently has a market capitalization of $524 million and a 24-hour trading volume of $20.98 million.

item.title: Solana On-Chain Meme Coin BOSS Surges Over 132% in 24 Hours, Reaching a Market Cap of $29 Million
item.description: On August 8th, according to GMGN data, the Solana-based Meme coin BOSS witnessed a surge of over 132% within the past 24 hours. It has a market capitalization of $29 million and a 24-hour trading volume of $69 million.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins typically lack practical use cases and undergo significant price fluctuations. Therefore, investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: AguilaTrades has increased its long positions for BTC and ETH to $227 million, currently realizing a profit of $3.227 million.
item.description: On August 8th, according to on-chain analyst Ai (@ai_9684xtpa), trader AguilaTrades has boosted their long positions in BTC and ETH to $227 million this morning, currently having a floating profit of $3.227 million.· BTC: 40 times long, holding 1277.75 BTC, with an entry price of $115,968.· ETH: 25 times long, holding 20296.06 ETH, and the entry price is $3,783.1.

item.title: CME FedWatch: 92.7% Probability of 25 Basis Point Rate Cut in September
item.description: On August 8th, based on CME's "FedWatch" data, the likelihood of a 25-basis-point rate cut in September is 92.7%, and the probability of rates remaining unchanged is 7.3%.

item.title: Upbit Lists STORY (STO) Spot Trading
item.description: On August 8th, according to official information, Upbit has launched STORY (IP) spot trading, with support for KRW, BTC, and USDT markets.Based on HTX market data, influenced by the news of Upbit's listing, IP saw a short-term surge of over 15% and is currently priced at $7.14.

item.title: Affected by the Upbit listing news, IP surged over 15% in a short period
item.description: On August 8th, according to HTX market data, due to the announcement of the Upbit listing, IP briefly surged by more than 15% and is currently trading at $7.14.

item.title: Shitcoins See Bull Run: Pendle Surges by 27.51%, XRP Spikes 11% as Lawsuit Ends
item.description: On August 8th, based on HTX market data, since Bitcoin broke through $117,000 this morning and Ethereum broke through $3,900, altcoins witnessed a general surge. These include:- BIO with a 24-hour gain of 47.86% and currently priced at $0.09.- BB with a 24-hour gain of 42.94% and currently priced at $0.1448.- PENDLE with a 24-hour gain of 27.51% and currently priced at $5.1.- ORCA with a 24-hour gain of 21.24% and currently priced at $2.6.- FXS with a 24-hour gain of 15.28% and currently priced at $2.94.- XLM with a 24-hour gain of 14.34% and currently priced at $0.4566.- LDO with a 24-hour gain of 12.07% and currently priced at $1.048.- XRP with a 24-hour gain of 11.13% and currently priced at $3.31.- LINK with a 24-hour gain of 10.46% and currently priced at $18.38.

item.title: Pendle Finance's multi-signature address sent 900,000 PENDLE to Binance
item.description: On August 8th, according to on-chain data analyst Yu Jin, a multi-signature address of Pendle Finance transferred 900,000 PENDLE tokens (approximately $4.65 million) to Binance around 25 minutes ago. Additionally, according to HTX market data, PENDLE has witnessed a 24-hour price increase of 28.31% and is currently trading at $5.118.
